attributes.action: Award for the Hillsborough families fight for justice
attributes.additional_details: After the recent shocking findings of the Hillsborough Independent Panel,I would like to petition the government to award national honours to family members,who have fought so valiantly to obtain the truth of what happened to those who died on that terrible day in 1989.These people represent all that is best in the British character.A quiet dignity,a refusal to be ground down by authorities that lied to and deceived them.But most of all a stomach for a fight,when a total injustice was thrown up at them.After twenty three years of struggle what they knew from the start of what went on at Hillsborough as shown up at last as THE TRUTH
